Uses of Enum Class
model.GameState

Packages that use GameState
Package
Description
controller
The controller package contains all the classes responsible for managing the interactions between the user, the model and the view of the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
model
The model package contains the classes that define the logic and state of the Tic-Tac-Toe game (in progress, invalid move, win, tie).
